title: Remote for Sony TV & Sony Blu-Ray Players MyAV
summary: MyAV is an unofficial Sony TV/BD/AVR/TiVO & universal remote control app. TRIAL
description: This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP/IR controllable devices, such as Sky+HD, TiVo etc...Unofficial WI-Fi & IR remote control for "Sony" Televisions & Blu-ray Players. Sony is a registered trademark of the Sony Corporation. This app is in no way affiliated with Sony, it simply works with some of their products.Your Sony Smart TV or Blu Ray player must be connected to your router AND YOUR ROUTER MUST HAVE uPnP ENABLED... if the app doesn't find your Sony Smart TV the please CONTACT US by email or read the instructions on our website. If you have a Samsung/HTC Android device with an IR(InfraRed) blaster, this will be detected by MyAV and older IR equipment can be controlled too.MyAV can also control a lot of other devices around your home, not just Sony. Set-top boxes: Dish, DirecTV, TiVo and SkyQ/Sky+HDAVR receivers: Denon, Marantz, Onkyo, Rotel, Harman, Sony, Yamaha, Pioneer, Arcam, AnthemStreamers: Roku, Western Digital, KodiBlu-Ray: Oppo, Sony, Samsung, LG, Panasonic, Pioneer, ArcamTVs: Sony, Samsung,Sharp, Panasonic,LG, Philips, BushProjectors: Sony, JVC, Epson (maually add IP address)Lighting: Philips HueFor the UK, USA, Germany, France, Belgium, Australia, New Zealand, Spain, Netherlands, Denmark, Norway & Sweden channel shortcuts are available. These can be renumbered by dragging them to the pop-up keypad that appears when you long-click on a shortcut.Sony Smart Televisions2015-2017: All Smart models2014:  (tested) KD85X9505 KD55X9005 descriptionHTML:
This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP/IR controllable devices, such as Sky+HD, TiVo etc...
Unofficial WI-Fi & IR remote control for "Sony" Televisions & Blu-ray Players. Sony is a registered trademark of the Sony Corporation. This app is in no way affiliated with Sony, it simply works with some of their products.
Your Sony Smart TV or Blu Ray player must be connected to your router AND YOUR ROUTER MUST HAVE uPnP ENABLED... if the app doesn't find your Sony Smart TV the please CONTACT US by email or read the instructions on our website.
If you have a Samsung/HTC Android device with an IR(InfraRed) blaster, this will be detected by MyAV and older IR equipment can be controlled too.

MyAV can also control a lot of other devices around your home, not just Sony.
Set-top boxes: Dish, DirecTV, TiVo and SkyQ/Sky+HD
AVR receivers: Denon, Marantz, Onkyo, Rotel, Harman, Sony, Yamaha, Pioneer, Arcam, Anthem
Streamers: Roku, Western Digital, Kodi
Blu-Ray: Oppo, Sony, Samsung, LG, Panasonic, Pioneer, Arcam
TVs: Sony, Samsung,Sharp, Panasonic,LG, Philips, Bush
Projectors: Sony, JVC, Epson (maually add IP address)
Lighting: Philips Hue

For the UK, USA, Germany, France, Belgium, Australia, New Zealand, Spain, Netherlands, Denmark, Norway & Sweden channel shortcuts are available. These can be renumbered by dragging them to the pop-up keypad that appears when you long-click on a shortcut.

Sony Smart Televisions
2015-2017: All Smart models

2014: (tested) KD85X9505 KD55X9005 KD65X9005 KD79X9005 KD65X8005 KD55X8005 KD49X8005 KDL65W955B KDL55W955B KDL60W855B KDL55W805B KDL50W805B KDL42W805B KDL50W705B KDL42W705B KDL32W705B KDL60W605B KDL48W605B KDL40W605B KDL48W600B KDL40W600B KDL60W630B KDL55W800B KDL50W800B KDL70W850B KDL60W850B KDL65W950B KDL55W950B KDL42W700B, XBR55X850B, XBR65X850B, XBR70X850B, XBR55X900B, XBR65X900B, XBR79X900B,XBR65X950B, XBR85X950B,KDL50W790B, KDL55W790B,KDL60W840B, KDL70W840B,KDL55W950B, KDL65W950B, KDL70R550A, XBR52LX905

comments: Bought the paid version. Doesn't work with my Foxtel IQ3 box. Doesn't work with my Optus Fetch Mighty. Sort of works with my Sony BDV but functionally vastly inferior to actual remote.
Says it's free after a week it says my free trial is over and I have to purchase the app for 8.99 to continue to use it . I'm ordering a new remote off eBay because my actual remote broke.
This app is pure garbage didn't even work apps like this should be banned from Google play store

Absolutely brilliant. Can only imagine that those who give it a poor rating are the same kind of geniuses that think crayons are hors d'œuvres. Set up different profiles for different rooms. My whole house can now be controlled from my phone. The only way it could be better if it had an xbox one remote too, but hey ho can't win them all. Only gripe is volume has just suddenly stopped working. Don't know if due to a recent update as I have auto updates. Going to uninstall and see if that fixes. Also nit picking. Make your menus look a bit prettier. It looks unfinished.
Finally an app that works with the Samsung s8 as remote. i país 8$ and now I have to pay 1$ monthly????
I need to remove and get my money back Its almost 5 months plus 8.99 the subscription
